summary: Four Parisian women navigate the world of romance and daily life looking to fulfill their dreams but often find real-life to be inescapable.
cast: Bernadette Lafont|Clotilde Joano|Stéphane Audran|Lucile Saint-Simon|Pierre Bertin|Jean-Louis Maury|Albert Dinan|Ave Ninchi|Sacha Briquet|Claude Berri|Jean Barclay|Rossana Rossanigo|Dolly Bell|Gabriel Gobin|France Asselin|Jean-Marie Arnoux|Robert Barre|Trio Rody Renatal|Dominique Zardi|Philippe Castelli|Mario David|Henri Attal|Charles Bayard|Charles Belmont|Serge Bento|Karen Blanguernon|Claude Chabrol|Jenny Doria|Liliane Dreyfus|Simone Landry|Louison Roblin|László Szabó
title: Les bonnes femmes
